20110119010135.000|20110119010138.000|CC1|AND THEY SAY AT THE END OF THE

20110119010152.000|20110119010152.000|CC1|ABC 7 "EYEWITNESS NEWS."

20110119010155.000|20110119010157.000|CC1|STUDENTS WERE RUSHED TO COUNTY

20110119010202.000|20110119010204.000|CC1|BEING MONITORED CLOSELY.

20110119010206.000|20110119010207.000|CC1|THE 15-YEAR-OLD GIRL WHO WAS

20110119010219.000|20110119010220.000|CC1|THE LEFT SIDE HER HEAD.

20110119010233.000|20110119010236.000|CC1|BLOOD CLOT ON THE LEFT SIDE OF

20110119013043.000|20110119013044.000|CC1|ARREST SUSPECTED OF BRINGING A  
20110119013044.000|20110119013046.000|CC1|GUN TO SCHOOL IN A BACKPACK.    
20110119013046.000|20110119013048.000|CC1|POLICE SAID THE GUN MAY HAVE    
20110119013048.000|20110119013049.000|CC1|DISCHARGED ACCIDENTALLY WHEN THE
20110119013049.000|20110119013051.000|CC1|BACKPACK WAS PUT DOWN.          
20110119013051.000|20110119013052.000|CC1|A 15-YEAR-OLD GIRL WAS SHOT IN  
20110119013052.000|20110119013054.000|CC1|THE HEAD, SHE HAS UNDERGONE     
20110119013054.000|20110119013055.000|CC1|SURGERY AND IS IN CRITICAL      
20110119013055.000|20110119013055.000|CC1|CONDITION.

20110119013057.000|20110119013058.000|CC1|15-YEAR-OLD BOY IN THE NECK.

20110119013115.000|20110119013116.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THAT'S RIGHT, MARK 
20110119013116.000|20110119013117.000|CC1|I'M HERE AT L.A.P.D. HARBOR

20110119013201.000|20110119013202.000|CC1|MAGNETIC WANDS THAT YOU USED BY

20110119013706.000|20110119013709.000|CC1|NORTH, ABC 7 "EYEWITNESS NEWS." 
20110119013709.000|20110119013710.000|CC1|MARC: THE MAN KNOWN FOR BRINGING
20110119013710.000|20110119013712.000|CC1|THE iPHONE, THE iPOD AND
